Best Paper & Honourable Mention ITC 2023

Best Paper :
Power Domain Aware DFT Implementation –
Sarthak Singhal, Subhasish Mukherjee, Christos Papameletis, Krishna Chakravadhanula, Ankit Bandejia, Dale Meehl, Archana Vyas and Mohan Gandla

 

First Honourable Mention :
Analysis of Non-idealities in On-chip Loopback Testing of Data Converters –
Tamajeet Mandal, Aswin R and Rubin Parekhji

 

Second Honourable Mention :
Bridging Repairability Gaps in Shared Bus Architecture with Shared Physical Memory Implementation –
Nikhil Karkare and Wilson Pradeep
